long_description: Wear the lightweight Patagonia Nine Trails jacket for comfortable training sessions in cool, drizzly weather. Ripstop nylon torso, shoulders and arms offer tough protection from wind and light rain, and stretchy, mostly recycled fabric on back and shoulders breathes well. Entire jacket features a Durable Water Repellent finish that sheds light precipitation and prevents stains from splashes and mud. Full-length zipper has a draft flap to prevent the chill from seeping through; tall collar has a brushed fleece lining for next-to-skin comfort. Packed down into its rear zippered pocket, the jacket is simple to tote along if the skies look stormy. Shaped cuffs protect the top of hands. Drawcord at hem enhances protection from drafts. Reflective detailing increases your visibility in low light. The Patagonia Nine Trails jacket offers a slim fit that's designed to move with you as you run.
short_description: Wear the lightweight Patagonia Nine Trails jacket for comfortable training sessions in cool, drizzly weather.
